name: Ref. Case Com. Elec. WH (FS)
_description: Represents switch to electric commercial water heating technologies with efficiency levels determined by a sales-weighted average of the efficiencies/costs of typical electric commercial water heating technologies currently (or soon to be) on the market, from AEO 2021

market_entry_year_source.notes: Assume historical measure penetration is captured in baseline

energy_efficiency_source.notes: Sales-weighted combinations of WH efficiencies for typical 2020 HPWH and electric resistance storage WH. New/replacement sales numbers drawn from AEO microdata files, available from EIA upon request.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

installed_cost_source.notes: Sales-weighted combinations of WH installed costs for typical 2020 HPWH and electric resistance storage WH. New/replacement sales numbers drawn from AEO microdata files, available from EIA upon request.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Sales-weighted combinations of WH lifetimes for typical 2020 HPWH and electric resistance storage WH. New/replacement sales numbers drawn from AEO microdata files, available from EIA upon request.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies
